entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 5:30 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SW 41 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023
